rating_comment:

info: Rating, 4 stars,  · December 2023,  · Group trip
rating_comment: Very precious space in the flat, nice location. We loved it, felt like home.

info: Rating, 4 stars,  · April 2023,  · Stayed a few nights
rating_comment: We booked the property for 3 nights. The property claimed to have 3 bedrooms with ACs and other equipment and fully functioning kitchen. But unfortunately one of the ACs wasnt working and also the fridge started working 1 day after we checked in. But the host and his manager were friendly, the location is very good and overall we had a good stay. Only thing is that this place needs a bit of maintenance.

info: Rating, 5 stars,  · March 2023,  · Stayed one night
rating_comment: Kawsar's place is very good for airport traveller and it is just 5 minute drive from hazrat shahjalal international airport. it is secured with 24 hour guard and close circuit camera. The onsite manager is very cooperative and amicable person. it's a very beautiful apartment. it is highly recommended to the guest.

info: Rating, 4 stars,  · February 2023
rating_comment:
We stayed at this place for nearly a month recently. The location was close to shops and transports which was very convenient for us with a family of 5. The host was always responsive and helpful. We appreciated the extra blanket provided during some unusually cold Winter days and also providing the microwave oven few days after our move in. Only suggestion would be to communicate proactively to avoid any confusions and set the right expectations.
Overall it was a positive experience with good value.

info: Rating, 5 stars,  · December 2022,  · Stayed one night
rating_comment: We enjoyed our stay. The host is accommodating and helpful. However, we felt providing few amenities would have been cherry on top. Regardless we enjoyed our stay and would recommend to others.

rating_comment: great place to stay.

rating_comment: Great host and great place to stay.

info: Rating, 3 stars,  · August 2022
rating_comment: Good place but could be better as if flat is fully booked and you are staying alone than other rooms can be used by the host for other boarder. So you might get disturbed

info: Rating, 5 stars,  · June 2022,  · Stayed one night
rating_comment: Kawsar is a good host. It was a short stay for me, but I had good experience. I plan to stay again when I visit Bangladesh.

info: Rating, 3 stars,  · June 2022,  · Stayed one night
rating_comment: Kawsar was a great host. The response time was very quick. The experience was good, but just needs a little attention in cleanliness. Overall the family were happy.

info: Rating, 5 stars,  · June 2022
rating_comment: Great location, an even better host and total value for money! Kawsar went out of his way to ensure my comfort and even helped me plan my trip. If you’re visiting Dhaka, Kawsar is the host you stay with!

info: Rating, 5 stars,  · March 2022
rating_comment:
Kawsar is a super host without any doubt, he also is a great communicator. From the very beginning of our trip to the end, he was in touch with us, kept us informed and was always available for us when needed. The apartment was as described, neat, tidy and fresh. Kawsar ensured our comfort and a very pleasant experience while staying in his apartment during our trip to Dhaka this year.
He is friendly, respectful and very resourceful, eager to help his guests, goes above and beyond to ensure the safety and comfort of his guests.
I would highly recommend Kawasar, and we look forward to being his guest again soon!!

info: Rating, 5 stars,  · March 2022
rating_comment: Kawser deserves five stars for his service. Considering the crises of short term accommodation in Dhaka, especially, for families living abroad when visiting home country, Kawser has started a pioneering service. Kawser did everything to fulfil all of my needs. However, the airbnb listing should have more details with real photos and proper descriptions of facilities.

info: Rating, 5 stars,  · March 2022,  · Stayed one night
rating_comment: Nice place. I would like to go back there
